sentences.sContent: We boycott all products tested on animals.
sentences.sCn: 我们抵制所有拿动物做试验的产品。

remMethod.val: boy + cott(音似： cut剃) → 男孩子们剃头以示抗议 → 抵制

trans.tranOther: to refuse to buy something, use something, or take part in something as a way of protesting
an act of boycotting something, or the period of time when it is boycotted
